Name: limit_user_story_to_one_sprint_backlog
Description: Each user story is assigned to at most one sprint backlog (R11)

Name: sprint_backlog_belongs_to_one_sprint
Description: Each sprint backlog belongs to exactly one sprint (R12)

Name: assign_team_to_exactly_one_project
Description: Each team is assigned to exactly one project (R1)

Name: team_has_exactly_one_scrum_master
Description: Each team has exactly one Scrum Master (R6)

Name: task_belongs_to_one_user_story
Description: Each task belongs to exactly one user story (R10)

Name: user_story_belongs_to_one_epic
Description: Each user story belongs to exactly one epic (R9)

Name: limit_blocker_severity_threshold
Description: Total severity of blockers per sprint is below a threshold

Name: enforce_wip_limit_on_scrumboard
Description: Tasks on a scrum board may not exceed number_of_cards

Name: story_points_within_sprint_capacity
Description: Story points planned into a sprint may not exceed sprint capacity

Name: daily_scrum_duration_limit
Description: Each Daily Scrum duration is at most 15 minutes

Name: sprint_planning_duration_limit
Description: Each Sprint Planning duration is at most 240 minutes

Name: sprint_review_min_attendees
Description: Each Sprint Review must have at least a minimum number of attendees
